about_the_game:
Non-stop Team Battles and Tactical Fests 24/7

  • Epic Team Fights: Experience the intensity of combat in chokepoints and holds, intense clashes between giant beasts and war machines, and game-changing moments with tactical gadgets, all culminating in the explosive arrival of heroic figures who devastate the battlefield!

  • Thrill of Tactical Gameplay: Launch surprise attacks to destroy enemy formations, ambush your opponents and disrupt their supply lines, or use the terrain to lure enemies into deadly traps and encirclements...

Pure and Intense Warfare

  • Take part in Month-long Territorial Wars: Engage in city sieges and claim planetary dominance. Experience fast-paced team battles and skirmishes like those in traditional MOBAs, with the added depth of sandbox-like strategic choices for targeting key strategic points and attack routes. All of this is designed to immerse you in every aspect of war, from pre-battle planning to team coordination and battlefield tactics.

  • Victorious or defeated, the battle doesn’t stop: Victorious or vanquished, the fight for supremacy continues on new planets. Each new conquest starts anew, offering fresh, exciting gameplay mechanics and updates, welcoming all ambitious warriors who dare to claim the crown.

Jump into the Fight

  • Recruit Over 40 Unique Drifters: Gather a team of Drifters, each with their own special abilities, to fight in your name. You can easily change your Drifter setup when you return to base, ensuring you’re ready to adapt to the ever-changing conditions of war and for any challenges ahead.

  • Customize with Hundreds of Gear Options: With 12 different weapon types and nearly 100 items in total, you can customize your equipment to suit your style. Each type comes with its own skill tree, allowing you to freely customise skills and builds to your liking. Explore countless synergies and combos to create your perfect loadout!

Roam the Remnants of a Once-Proud Planet

  • Dynamic Drifter Base: Transform your Drifter Bases and use them as mobile vehicles.

  • Explore the Planet: With your drone and base, explore a variety of environments and breathtaking landscapes.

  • Weather and Environment: Experience dynamic weather systems like sandstorms, meteor showers, blizzards, and electromagnetic storms, all of which impact your gameplay and survival strategy.

name: Warborne Above Ashes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8600 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on board
  • VR Support: Not supported
  • Additional Notes: SSD(preferred)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700 / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on board
  • VR Support: Not supported
  • Additional Notes: SSD is highly recommended

short_description: The vast Empire fell to the expanding desires fueled by Exergy, and fierce flames of war are now raging. We roam, fight, and defeat all who stand in the way of our ambitions, Join a faction in the sci-fi post apocalyptic-style multiplayer PvP war game Warborne Above Ashes, and fight for honor!
